author: newsr.in
title: Kanye West Auditions for 'American Idol' in San Francisco (Video)
text: Kanye West high-fives Ryan Seacrest after making a surprise appearance during the American Idol auditions on Saturday (October 10) in San Francisco, Calif. The 38-year-old rapper, who was joined by wife Kim Kardashian, sang his 2005 hit “Gold Digger” for the panel of judges, which includes Jennifer Lopez, Harry Connick, Jr., and Keith Urban. In [...] »
